labels.LABEL_13: Note: Please save the Second Vitals form to record the observations .

concepts.ARTERIAL_BLOOD_OXYGEN_SATURATION_(PULSE_: Oxygen saturation, as measured from a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.SYSTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_20_DESC: A patient's systolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.PULSE_14_DESC: Patient pulse rate, as measured with a peripheral oximeter.
concepts.DIASTOLIC_BLOOD_PRESSURE_21_DESC: A patient's diastolic blood pressure measurement (taken with a manual cuff in either a sitting or standing position)
concepts.RESPIRATORY_RATE_16_DESC: Measured respiratory rate in breaths per minute
concepts.BODY_POSITION_22_DESC: Body position for procedure or blood pressure measurement
